Labeling in the pharma industry

Labeling of injection syringes, ampoules or tablet boxes

In no other industry secure and error-free product labeling/identiÔ¨Åcation so important. We know that smooth labeling of pharmaceutical products must meet numerous specifications and guidelines, such as the Global Compliance Standards, product and anti-counterfeiting requirements and ISEGA approval. In addition to these specifications, the labeling in the pharma industry must meet almost banal requirements such as product branding and traceability. NOVEXX Solutions supports you in this by:

Industrial labeling machines

Automatic printing systems

Traceability software

Labels and ribbon

Your requirement - our solution

Labels in the pharma industry are primarily used to convey information. To provide the end consumer with information about expiry dates, ingredients, instructions for use or warnings, the labels must be perfectly legible and contain every piece of information. NOVEXX Solutions offers the following solutions for this:

Wide range of labels: the variety of NOVEXX labels is almost limitless, so we can produce the perfect pharmaceutical label for any application. We offer labels that meet all the requirements of the pharmaceutical industry: Deep-freeze, resistant to solvents and disinfectants as well as resistant to moisture, fats and oils. Choose NOVEXX labels if you need secure adhesion, even on difficult surfaces, or small radii. Comprehensive information can be applied to the respective pharmaceutical product with booklet labels, for example.

Automatic printing and labeling systems: For the data to be clearly decipherable for the end user, the printed image must be perfect. Print information such as barcodes, expiry dates, ingredients and much more on your label with our XPA 93x. NOVEXX also develops special solutions specifically for the pharmaceutical industry that apply labels to any type of product, such as cannulas, syringes or other pharmaceutical packaging. Ask our specialists for advice.

Pharmaceutical products must be handled sensitively and properly. Incorrect handling can cause great damage. For this reason, manufacturers of the pharma industry must ensure safety and preventive measures to protect everyone involved. NOVEXX Solutions provides support with

Labels: Easy-to-read labels inform those involved about important information for handling and using the chemicals. Labels from NOVEXX are individually designed for the respective application and can also be produced according to technical and customer-specific requirements (adhesion, heat resistance, functionality).

Printing and labeling systems: For a clear and legible printed image, customers use the XPA 93x Print & Apply system. A high-quality print image is generated fully automatically on the label and can be applied to a wide variety of products such as canisters, barrels and much more using applicators. The tamper-evident process, which protects end consumers and guarantees authenticity, is also frequently in demand here.

Secure and error-free product labeling is particularly important in the pharmaceutical industry. Numerous specifications and guidelines, such as global compliance standards, anti-counterfeiting requirements and ISEG approval must be met.

The production environment in the pharmaceutical industry is special, as it is subject to very strict regulations and quality standards. This also applies to the printing and labeling of products, as the highest accuracy and reliability are required to ensure the safety and efficacy of the drugs.

Therefore, special Print & Apply Systems are needed that meet the requirements of the pharmaceutical industry and enable complete product traceability.

It is extremely important to guarantee the end consumer maximum safety, and complete traceability within the production chain. This is what we offer:

With PID 3SIXTY, we offer an audit trail that helps you to comply with FDA regulations. In this way, you ensure and control "who" did "what", "when" and "for what" reason. With this data management software, you can also manage all print jobs and labeling data, such as expiry dates or ingredient lists. PID 3SIXTY can also be used to centrally control a wide range of labeling devices, such as thermal transfer, inkjet or laser printers.

RFID: Our printing & labeling systems enable the encoding, writing and checking of labels with RFID UHF chips. We also offer a selection of RFID UHF inlays and labels.

The labeling of pharmaceutical products is very individual and specific. NOVEXX Solutions is a specialist when it comes to specific requirements that must also meet prescribed standards.

Contact our specialists or visit our partner LSS to find out more about our extensive expertise in pharmaceutical labeling.
